thread.title: Ocean City retains title as New Jersey's most popular beach
thread.title_full: Ocean City retains title as New Jersey's most popular beach

author: Wayne Parry
title: Ocean City retains title as New Jersey's most popular beach
text:
Ocean City retains title as New Jersey's most popular beach ANTHONY SMEDILE, THE PRESS OF ATLANTIC CITY FILE PHOTO Ocean City, N.J. is the Jersey Shore's most popular beach for 2015. The crowd here enjoyed the surf over the 2011 Labor Day weekend. Ocean City, N.J. is the Jersey Shore's most popular beach for 2015. The crowd here enjoyed the surf over the 2011 Labor Day weekend. (ANTHONY SMEDILE, THE PRESS OF ATLANTIC CITY FILE PHOTO) By Wayne Parry Of The Associated Press Guess Jersey Shore's most popular beach for 2015 
OCEAN CITY, N.J. — The winner and still champion of New Jersey's Top Ten Beaches contest is … Ocean City. 
The southern New Jersey beach town that bills itself as "America's Greatest Family Resort" was named the state's most popular beach Thursday. It's the second straight win for Ocean City, which also won in 2009. 
The contest is sponsored by the New Jersey Sea Grant Consortium and Stockton College as a way of making people feel more connected to, and protective of, the state's 127-mile coastline.
